channel.title: Internet Marketing Reality
channel.description: Internet marketing reality - tips, techniques, interviews. Real people, real challenges, real success, no B.S.
channel.itunes:author: Bill Romer
channel.itunes:subtitle: Internet marketing - real people, real challenges, real success, no B.S.
channel.itunes:summary: Internet Marketing Reality is all about the non-hyped world of everyday internet marketing. What works, what doesn't, whose methods work, and whose don't.
channel.itunes:keywords: internet marketing, online marketing, make money online

item.title: Internet Marketing Basics
item.description: In this episode, we go over internet marketing basics and the application of traditional sales and marketing techniques to online business.
item.itunes:author: Bill Romer
item.itunes:keywords: internet marketing basics, online marketing, make money online
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we go over internet marketing basics and the application of traditional sales and marketing techniques to online business.
